text: Safran is a French company specialized in aerospace. Its headquarters are located in Paris. It has been created in 2005 by Snecma and Sagem.Fusion surprise de Snecma et Sagem It provide aircraft engines, helicopters and missiles, aircraft equipment and defense.Safran entre dans le CAC40 The group has more than 81,000 employees. == References == ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Companies based in Paris Category:2005 establishments in France
title: Safran
